description:
Isn’t it great when comfort and performance come together? They thought so too, that's why they decided to take it a step further and create the men's Super Mojo Short II.

Made from a recycled polyester blend, this lightweight fabric is built with 4-way stretch. That means it’s super comfortable and super shape retaining. From there, they added a plush elastic waistband for unbeatable security with none of the itch.

But did you think they'd stop there? Of course not. They went on to include the hard-working features you need—like moisture-wicking and quick-drying properties, UPF 50+, and an extra Velcro-closure pocket in the back to stash your phone or cards.
name: Prana Super Mojo Shorts II, 10" Inseam - Mens
